title: After Fall Of Ramadi, Iraqi Troops Hope For More U.S. Support
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish interviews Washington Post reporter Loveday Morris about how the city of Ramadi, Iraq, fell to the self-declared Islamic State. She says Iraqi troops in the city were worn down.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
